meaningMnemonic: I need something to <kanji>provide</kanji> to me in an emergency, so I'm <kanji>amass</kanji>ing <vocabulary>emergency stores</vocabulary>. I'm building up a <vocabulary>stockpile</vocabulary> of <vocabulary>reserves</vocabulary>, just in case.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
